name: Augment Inc.
headline: Augment automates business roles like sales and accounting with AI.
description:
üíº Augment builds AI-powered tools to automate company operations, starting with Roger‚Äîan intelligent CRM that acts as your AI-powered sales team. üíº

üöÄ Built by experienced founders and backed by Y Combinator, Augment is redefining sales automation with AI-driven workflows that handle prospecting, outreach, and deal management‚Äîso businesses can scale effortlessly.

How it Works ‚Äì 

Roger, Your AI-Powered CRM

üìä A CRM That Works for You

Unlike traditional CRMs that require constant manual updates, Roger actively manages your sales pipeline. It tracks interactions, follows up with leads, and keeps your team focused on closing deals instead of admin work.

ü§ñ AI-Powered Outreach & Engagement

Roger automates lead generation and crafts personalized outreach messages across email, LinkedIn, and other channels. It continuously refines its approach based on engagement data to increase conversions.

üéØ Smart Deal Management

Roger qualifies leads, schedules follow-ups, and moves deals through your pipeline automatically. It ensures your team never drops the ball on a potential customer.

üìà Seamless Integration & Insights

Roger syncs with your existing tools, updating your sales data in real-time. AI-powered analytics provide actionable insights, helping teams optimize sales strategies. By automating tedious sales tasks and making CRM proactive instead of passive, Roger turns AI into your most efficient sales teammate‚Äîhelping businesses close more deals, faster.

founders.name: Rithwik Pattikonda, Founder
founders.description: Founder at CardLift (YC S24, ZFellows) | Prev Founded TravelArrow and OctoShop (acq by Ibotta)

generated_description:
### Augment Inc. Overview

**Mission**: Augment Inc. is on a mission to revolutionize the business landscape by automating essential functions like sales and accounting through the power of AI. 

**Origins and Development**: Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator‚Äôs Batch S24, Augment started by creating AI-driven tools to streamline company operations. At the heart of this effort is **Roger**, an intelligent Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system that embodies their vision of transforming sales processes.

### The Intelligent CRM: Roger

Roger isn‚Äôt your average CRM. It stands out by actively managing sales pipelines rather than requiring constant updates from users. Here's what makes Roger unique:

- **AI-Powered Management**: Roger autonomously tracks interactions, follows up with leads, and prioritizes pipeline activities. The goal? Free your sales team from mundane admin work so they can focus on closing deals.
  
- **Automated Outreach**: With Roger, lead generation and outreach are automated across various channels‚Äîbe it email or LinkedIn‚Äîtailoring messages to engage effectively with potential clients.

- **Smart Deal Progression**: Roger qualifies leads, schedules follow-ups, and advances deals through the pipeline on autopilot, ensuring opportunities are never overlooked.

- **Real-Time Updates and Insights**: It seamlessly integrates with existing tools to provide real-time updates and analytics. This means actionable insights are at your fingertips, allowing teams to refine their sales strategies continuously.

### Key Features

1. **Prospecting**: Roger works tirelessly to identify ideal customer profiles and finds prospects that fit those criteria.
   
2. **Omnichannel Outreach**: The system executes a well-orchestrated communication plan, reaching out via multiple channels while maintaining a personal touch.

3. **Lead Tracking and Analysis**: Roger analyzes your lead pipeline in real time, suggesting smart follow-ups and highlighting opportunities based on engagement metrics. 

### Cost Efficiency

Roger‚Äôs pricing reflects significant cost advantages compared to traditional sales development representatives (SDRs). For just $6,000 a year, businesses can leverage its capabilities 24/7, leading to enormous savings and efficiency gains:

- **Cost Comparison**: Traditional SDRs can run up to $60,000 per year, while Roger provides a 95% cost reduction.
  
- **Performance and Return on Investment**: Users have reported a staggering ROI of up to 891%, making it a compelling choice for companies looking to scale their sales without the overhead.

### Team & Leadership

Currently operating with a lean team of two under the guidance of Jared Friedman from Y Combinator, Augment demonstrates how small teams can drive significant innovation when equipped with the right tools.

### Conclusion

Augment Inc. is redefining how businesses approach sales automation. With Roger, companies can save time, reduce costs, and ultimately close more deals, transforming their sales strategies into a highly efficient, AI-powered endeavor. Want to see what Augment can do for you? Check them out at [hireroger.com](https://hireroger.com).
